docs.text: Media Servarr List This is a list of useful applications to use for a home media server setup. Contributions welcome! If you think an application should be added to the list, please submit an issue of the application, what it does, and any links that might be useful. Applications Automation Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Bazarr Automates & manages subtitles bazarr.media morpheus65535/bazarr hotio , linuxserver.io CouchPotato Automates & manages movies couchpota.to CouchPotato/CouchPotatoServer Official , linuxserver.io Lidarr Automates & manages music lidarr.audio lidarr/lidarr hotio , linuxserver.io Mylar Automates & manages comics mylar3/mylar3 hotio , linuxserver.io Radarr Automates & manages movies radarr.video Radarr/Radarr hotio , linuxserver.io Readarr Automates & manages books and audiobooks readarr.com Readarr/Readarr hotio Sickbeard Automates downloading tv shows sickbeard.com midgetspy/Sick-Beard/ Official , linuxserver.io SickChill Automates & manages tv shows and anime sickchill.github.io SickChill/SickChill Official , linuxserver.io Sonarr Automates & manages tv shows and anime sonarr.tv Sonarr/Sonarr hotio , linuxserver.io Companion Apps Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Cardigann Proxy and API support for torrent trackers cardigann/cardigann Official , linuxserver.io Jackett Proxy and API support for torrent trackers Jackett/Jackett hotio , linuxserver.io Ombi Allows media requests and management ombi.io tidusjar/Ombi hotio , linuxserver.io Overseerr Allows media requests and management sct/overseerr Official , hotio Requestrr A chat bot used to simplify using services darkalfx/requestrr Official , hotio Media Servers Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Emby Media server and organizer emby.media MediaBrowser/Emby Official , linuxserver.io Jellyfin Media server and organizer jellyfin.org jellyfin/jellyfin Official , hotio , linuxserver.io Plex Media server and organizer plex.tv plexinc/pms-docker Official , hotio , linuxserver.io Other Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Commandarr A bot that interacts with Sonarr/Radarr/Lidarr. docs.title: Other

docs.text: SickBeard Sick Beard is a PVR for newsgroup users (with limited torrent support). It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows and when they are posted it downloads them, sorts and renames them, and optionally generates metadata for them. It currently supports several torrent and usenet sites and retrieves show information from theTVDB.com and TVRage.com. Warning Sickbeard has not been in development since March 2016. It is recommended to use another application found in Similar Applications . If yhu feel like this is a mistake, please open an issue . Info This page is bare and can use more information! If you would like to contribute, please open an issue . Links Website Download Github Wiki Docker Hub Official linuxserver.io Notes Nothing to display here at this time. If you would like to add a note, please open an issue . Works with Nothing to display here at this time. If you would like to add an app that works with SickBeard, please open an issue . Similar Applications Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub SickChill Automates & manages tv shows and anime sickchill.github.io SickChill/SickChill Official , linuxserver.io Sonarr Automates & manages tv shows and anime sonarr.tv Sonarr/Sonarr hotio , linuxserver.io

docs.text: SickBeard SickChill is an automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows. It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows, and when they are posted it does its magic: automatic torrent/nzb searching, downloading, and processing at the qualities you want. Info This page is bare and can use more information! If you would like to contribute, please open an issue . docs.title: Similar Applications

docs.text: Sonarr Sonarr is a PVR for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new episodes of your favorite shows and will grab, sort, and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of files already downloaded when a better quality format becomes available. Links Website Download Github Wiki Docker Hub hotio linuxserver.io API Documentation Forums Discord Reddit Twitter Notes Sonarr works with both Usenet and Torrents. It is recommended that you use Jackett to proxy your torrent trackers to a format that Sonarr can read. You can use apps Ombi or Overseerr to consolidate requests to a single application and forward the request to Sonarr. This makes media management much easier. Works with Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Jackett Proxy and API support for torrent trackers Jackett/Jackett hotio , linuxserver.io Ombi Allows media requests and management ombi.io tidusjar/Ombi hotio , linuxserver.io Overseerr (alpha) Allows media requests and management sct/overseerr Official , hotio theme.park Themes for many applications Technical Ramblings gilbN/theme.park Official Similar Applications Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Sickbeard Automates downloading tv shows sickbeard.com midgetspy/Sick-Beard/ Official , linuxserver.io SickChill Automates & manages tv shows and anime sickchill.github.io SickChill/SickChill Official , linuxserver.io
